name: Pokémon Sweet
overview: Pokémon Sweet is a hack of Pokémon FireRed. What do you think and what do you see when seeing the word Sweet? Candies, cakes, food? What else? Ah, you feel so hungry, right? Then, play this hack to make your stomach feel more hungry (just a joke). The author of this game has completely transformed the Kanto Region into a new world of sweets.
